dahamibawa!obe sithath mebanduda?kusalayan ras kirima ha his kirimasamma samadhiya kiyanne hatharaweni dhyanayata witharak neweyi...thamata thamawath nathnam wenath monawada?kondesi rahitha podu samawapancha upadanaskandhaya handunaganimabandima ha duk widimaduppath pohosath wimata hethunawalapitiya dharmaraja wiharasthanaye asirimath pinkamadolosbage paragala bauddha madhyasthanaye budu madura wiwrutha kirimaambaathalaweka puranayaawabodha kala yuthu dharmaya meyayioopapathika uppaththiya yanu kumakda?sadacharaya, aarthikayen bahara kala yuthu da?dirghayusha labimata nam...udaguwime wipakagiya gamana sarthaka da hamuduruwane?indriya paropariyaththa nyanayamathale kosawana shià·Šra wishuddharama purana wiharayanawalapitiya aluthgama shri dharmaraja wiharasthanaye abhinawayen idikala maha chaithyarajayanan wahansege koth wahanse palandawa dhathun wahansela thanpathkara wiwrutha kirima dharmaraja wiharasthanaye wiharadhipathi handungamuwe sangharathana himiyange aaradhanayen purawidya chakrawarthi ellawala medhananda nahimiyan athulu maha sangharathnaya pradhanathwayen pasugiyada sidu kerini.babwagama maha danapathi amal pià·Šrayankara mahatha ge mulyamaya dayakathwayen sidukerunu mema pinkamata madhyama palath sabha manthri ee.

thirasara sanwardhanayak sandaha wu dilindukama pitudakima, gunathmaka adhyapanayak labadima, deshagunika wiparyasawalata muhuna dima, usas saukhya sewawak labadima, punarjananiya balashakthiya bhawithayata ganima, lokaya samanga sambandhatha wadidiyunu karaganima, nawina thakshanika upayamarga bhawithayata ganima, jalaja ha godabima jiwaya surakima athulu karunu 18k kerehi mehi di dadi awadhanayak yomu wi atha. 2030 warshaya wanawita thirasara sanwardhana ilakkayan jaya ganima sandaha shri lankawe mema wadasatahana kriyathmaka kirime di pradeshiya lekam karyala mattamin shri lanka eksath jathinge mithrathwa sangamaya samaga ekwa kriyathmakawana tharuna nayakayan 21 denaku bagin thoraganimata da niyamithaya.
